channel.title: How can I make it so players can't follow in a specific arena
channel.description:
How can I make it so players can't follow in a specific arena.
If they follow someone, they cheat in Gnome Stronghold Agility Course because I put some Bank Booth so they won't cheat with tickets.
Thanks if you help me.

item.title: How can I make it so players can't follow in a specific arena
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

just make a simple void .

if (isInArena() || isInGraardor() || isInApe() || isInJail() || isInRock()){ return; } if (isInPitRoom()){ sM("You can't follow in the waiting room!"); return; } if (isInAssault()){ sM("You can't follow in assault!"); return; }
first look for this part in your client.java.
then edit it and make it look like this.

if (isInArena() || isInGraardor() || isInApe() || isInJail() || isInRock || yourzone###()){ return; } if (isInPitRoom()){ sM("You can't follow in the waiting room!"); return; } if (isInAssault()){ sM("You can't follow in assault!"); return; } if (yourzone##()){ sM("You can't follow in youzone###!"); return; }
then simply make a void that declair the coords of the spot u want players to no follow eatchother.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so players can't follow in a specific arena
